title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card-hen Prologue - Sakura to Futatsu no Kuma
original_name: カードキャプターさくら クリアカード編 プロローグ さくらとふたつのくま
ending_song: "Yakusoku no Sora (約束の空)" by Junko Iwao
sinopse: After the conclusion of the Sakura Card Arc, life is going back to normal. There are no more mysteries, no more disturbances of evil, no more tests of strength. Everyone is moving on with their lives and Sakura feels a sadness in her heart. Even through the goodbyes, Sakura perseveres to keep everyone and a special someone, dear to her heart.
